name: DualWolf
description:
In this game, you play as a werewolf trying to satisfy their thirst for blood. But be warned, anger the villagers and they'll come for you during the day!

HOW TO PLAY:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move. If you are on a mobile device. change the input on the title screen and then use the on-screen joystick.
  • Your goal is to kill the villagers during the night while avoiding the villagers during the day.  You kill villagers simply by touching them. You can only kill villagers as a werewolf
  • When you walk to a villager as a werewolf, they become scared and try to hide, but they will attack you in the daytime.
  • Randomly, one of 4 pickups will spawn. Their effects are as follows:
    • Extra life
    • Faster Speed for 10 seconds
    • Angry villagers become docile
    • Water won't slow you down for 10 seconds
  • Every once in a while a villager will come out of their house with a torch. These villagers won't run away from you but instead will walk directly to you. These villagers aren't very smart though, they can accidentally light houses on fire making sure nobody can hide inside.

Made by Dynamism and Sirstotes
